author: andschwa
body: Making a new issue here to track dotnet/corefx#5903. In our JSON Pester tests we need to import a module by path, and `BaseDirectory` fails because of our native host, so we fall back to `CORE_ROOT`. We should be able to eliminate this workaround using @AlexGhiondea's suggestion.
title: Set System.AppContext.BaseDirectory explicitly
